DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test MK0767 lower blood glucose 20 week compare placebo . This early phase trial specific protocol information progress publicly available time . ( Full information available trial participant ) .
DOC.criteria: Patients Type 2 Diabetes Nonpregnant females patient agree become pregnant study Patients Type 1 Diabetes Patients treat insulin antihyperglycemic agent Patients viral hepatitis , active liver gallbladder disease , history pancreatitis , heart disease , congestive heart failure , inadequately control hypertension , HIV positive , history hematologic disorder neoplastic disease
